title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 09, 2021

items.title: Awesome Incident Response
items.content_text:
### IR Tools Collection / Log Analysis Tools

*   [Event Log Observer](https://lizard-labs.com/event_log_observer.aspx) - View, analyze and monitor events recorded in Microsoft Windows event logs with this GUI tool.
items.content_html:
IR Tools Collection / Log Analysis Tools

  • Event Log Observer - View, analyze and monitor events recorded in Microsoft Windows event logs with this GUI tool.

items.title: Awesome WebExtensions
items.content_text:
### Tools

*   [webpack-extension-reloader (⭐496)](https://github.com/rubenspgcavalcante/webpack-extension-reloader) - A Webpack plugin to automatically reload browser extensions during development.
items.content_html:
Tools

  • webpack-extension-reloader (⭐496) - A Webpack plugin to automatically reload browser extensions during development.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Feed Readers

*   [Leed (⭐223)](https://github.com/LeedRSS/Leed) - Leed (for Light Feed) is a Free and minimalist RSS aggregator. `AGPL-3.0` `PHP`

### Software / File Transfer - Peer-to-peer Filesharing

*   [bittorrent-tracker](https://webtorrent.io/) - Simple, robust, BitTorrent tracker (client and server) implementation. ([Source Code (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/webtorrent/bittorrent-tracker)) `MIT` `Nodejs`

### Software / File Transfer - Web-based File Managers

*   [Surfer](https://git.cloudron.io/cloudron/surfer) - Simple static file server with webui to manage files. `MIT` `Nodejs`
items.content_html:
Software / Feed Readers

  • Leed (⭐223) - Leed (for Light Feed) is a Free and minimalist RSS aggregator. AGPL-3.0 PHP

Software / File Transfer - Peer-to-peer Filesharing

  • bittorrent-tracker - Simple, robust, BitTorrent tracker (client and server) implementation. (Source Code (⭐1.9k)) MIT Nodejs

Software / File Transfer - Web-based File Managers

  • Surfer - Simple static file server with webui to manage files. MIT Nodejs

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Government

- API: [Istanbul (İBB) Open Data](https://data.ibb.gov.tr)

  Description: Data sets from the İstanbul Metropolitan Municipality (İBB)

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown
items.content_html:
Government

  • API: Istanbul (İBB) Open Data

    Description: Data sets from the İstanbul Metropolitan Municipality (İBB)

    Auth: No

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Unknown

items.title: Awesome Qt
items.content_text:
### Software that Uses Qt / New Functionality

*   [LMMS](https://lmms.io/) - Digital audio workstation.
*   [MuseScore](https://musescore.org) - Music notation software.
*   [Shotcut](https://shotcut.org/) - Video editor.
items.content_html:
Software that Uses Qt / New Functionality

  • LMMS - Digital audio workstation.
  • MuseScore - Music notation software.
  • Shotcut - Video editor.

items.title: Awesome LaTeX
items.content_text:
### Quality Check Tools

*   [TeXtidote (⭐995)](https://github.com/sylvainhalle/textidote) - A cross-platform (Java) spelling, grammar and style checker for LaTeX documents. ![windows](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/egeerardyn/awesome-LaTeX@700138fe725574e1741f148df6d1f77a8aa07eee/fig/windows.svg) ![linux](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/egeerardyn/awesome-LaTeX@700138fe725574e1741f148df6d1f77a8aa07eee/fig/linux.svg) ![mac](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/egeerardyn/awesome-LaTeX@700138fe725574e1741f148df6d1f77a8aa07eee/fig/apple.svg) ![foss](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/egeerardyn/awesome-LaTeX@700138fe725574e1741f148df6d1f77a8aa07eee/fig/foss.svg)
items.content_html:
Quality Check Tools

  • TeXtidote (⭐995) - A cross-platform (Java) spelling, grammar and style checker for LaTeX documents.

items.title: Awesome R Learning Resources
items.content_text:
### Topic Areas / Viz

*   [Coolors](https://coolors.co/) - The super fast color schemes generator! Create the perfect palette or get inspired by thousands of beautiful color schemes. Features include color picker, pick palette from photo, create a collage, make your own gradient palette, create a gradient, contrast checker, etc.
items.content_html:
Topic Areas / Viz

  • Coolors - The super fast color schemes generator! Create the perfect palette or get inspired by thousands of beautiful color schemes. Features include color picker, pick palette from photo, create a collage, make your own gradient palette, create a gradient, contrast checker, etc.

items.title: Awesome Linux Containers
items.content_text:
### Containers

*   [sysbox (⭐3.1k)](https://github.com/nestybox/sysbox)\
    Sysbox is a "runc" that creates secure (rootless) containers / pods that run not just microservices, but most workloads that run in VMs (e.g., systemd, Docker, and Kubernetes), seamlessly.
items.content_html:
Containers

  • sysbox (⭐3.1k)
    Sysbox is a "runc" that creates secure (rootless) containers / pods that run not just microservices, but most workloads that run in VMs (e.g., systemd, Docker, and Kubernetes), seamlessly.
